description: Used for salvo updating receiver transport files
title: Receiver transport file update

id.description: ID of a receiver to have its transport parameters updated

sender_id.description: ID of the Sender subscribed to by this Receiver

data.description: string providing connection and stream format parameters. If provided, the information contained in this string will override all user-configuration of parameters in the transport_params.  For RTP receivers, this string will be in SDP format. Setting this parameter to null signals that the receiver should be disabled on activation. In the case of RTP receivers this will cause the rtp_enabled transport parameter to be set to false.

by_reference.description: data provides a reference to the transport file rather than the data itself
